描.definition: to depict; to trace (a drawing); to copy; to touch up

描寫.definition: to describe; to depict; to portray; depiction; portrayal

描摹.definition: to trace over; to take a copy (of a calligraphy, a painting etc); (fig.) to describe; to portray

描紅.definition: to trace over red characters (as a method of learning to write); paper printed with red characters to trace over

描繪.definition: to describe; to depict; to portray
